name: Death Seeker
text:
If an enemy hero in radius has a card in the discard, **choose one —**
- **This turn**: You are immune to attacks.
- You may retrieve a discarded card.

name: Swift Justice
text:
**Choose one —**
- An enemy hero in range discards a card, if able; then, if able, that hero moves the number of spaces equal to that card's printed movement value in a straight line.
- Defeat a minion adjacent to you.

name: Vile Accusation
text: An enemy hero in range discards a card, if able; then, if able, that hero moves the number of spaces equal to that card's printed movement value in a straight line.

name: Blood Trail
text: Before the attack: Move up to 1 space for every empty minion spawn point in radius in the battle zone, up to a maximum of 2 spaces, then target a unit adjacent to you.

name: Crimson Thirst
text: Before the attack: Move up to 1 space for every empty minion spawn point in radius in the battle zone, up to a maximum of 3 spaces, then target a unit adjacent to you.

name: Sanguine Fury
text: Before the attack: Move up to 2 spaces for every empty minion spawn point in radius in the battle zone, up to a maximum of 4 spaces, then target a unit adjacent to you.

name: Sense Blood
text: Target a hero in range with a card in the discard, or a unit adjacent to you.

name: Blind Frenzy
text:
Target a hero in range with a card in the discard, or a unit adjacent to you.
May repeat once on a different hero.

name: Shadow Step
text: Place yourself into an empty minion spawn point in range in the battle zone.

name: Shadow Walk
text: Place yourself into an empty minion spawn point in range in the battle zone.

name: Creeping Shadow
text: Place yourself into an empty minion spawn point in range in the battle zone, or into a space in range adjacent to that spawn point.

name: No Escape
text: If an enemy hero in radius has a card in the discard, +2 ::movement:: Movement.

name: Dark Stalker
text: If an enemy hero in radius has a card in the discard, +3 ::movement:: Movement.

name: Cause Fear
text: Move up to 3 enemy minions in radius, up to 1 space in the same direction.

name: Instill Dread
text: Move up to 3 enemy minions in radius, up to 2 spaces in the same direction; they can be moved through obstacles.

name: Strike Terror
text: Move up to 3 enemy minions in radius, up to 3 spaces in the same direction; they can be moved through obstacles.

name: Lesser Evil
text:
An enemy hero in range **chooses one —**
- That hero discards a card, if able.
- You defeat a minion adjacent to you.

name: Greater Good
text:
An enemy hero in range **chooses one —**
- That hero discards a card, or is defeated.
- You defeat up to 3 minions adjacent to you.

name: Grim Reaper
text: After you perform a basic action, you may repeat it once, choosing the same, or a different option.
